name: Dracule Mihawk
text: On Play If you have 2 or less characters, play up to 1 4 cost or lower 'Shigearu Kingdom' type or 'Slash' trait character card other than 'Dracule Mihawk' from your hand rested.

effect.text: If you have 2 or less characters, play up to 1 4 cost or lower 'Shigearu Kingdom' type or 'Slash' trait character card other than 'Dracule Mihawk' from your hand rested.
